div.l: Aleyn wax wery in þe dawenyng
For he hadde swonken all þe longe nyght
And seide farewel Malyn swete whight
The day is come I may no lenger bide
But eủer mo wher͗e so y go or ryde
I am þyn owne clerk so haue I sele
Now dere lēmman qduod she go fare well
But or þou go oo þing I wole þe telle
Whan that þou wendest howmward by þe melle
Right at þe entre of þe dore bi hynde
Thou shalt a kake of halff of busshel fynde
That was I maked of þyn owne mele
Which þat I hepl my selff for to stele
And gode lēmman god þe saue and kepe
And with þat word almost he gan to wepe
Aleyn vp rist ⁊and þouȝt or þat it dawe
I wille go crepen in by me felawe
And fond þe cradel with his honde a non
By god thouȝt he al wrang I haue mysgon
Myn hed is toty of my swynk to nyght
That maketh me þat I go nouȝt a right
I wote well by þe cradel I haue mysgo
Here lithe þe meller ⁊and his wif also
And forth he goth on twenty deuele way
Vn to þe bedde þ̉er as þe meller lay
He wende haue cropen by his felaw Iohn
And by the meller in he crepe a non
And caught him by þe nekke ⁊and softe he spak
He seide þou Iohn þou swyneshed a wake
For cⁱristes sawle and here a noble game
For by þat lord þat called is saynt Iame
As y haue þryes in þis shorte nyght
Swyfed þe Mellers doughter bolt vp ryght
While þou hast as a coward ben agastgastagast
Ye false harlot qduod þe meller hast
A fals tratour fals clerk qduod he
Thou shalt be deed by goddes dignite
